name: Nightout
tagline: Table Booking App for Night Clubs with Event Display
body:
# NightOut-iOS
Repository for NightOut iOS app
A demo of the current version of NightOut App, a table reservation app for night clubs made for DinoMedia.

### Demo of the App
![App Demo](http://gifyu.com/images/latestAppProgress.gif)
https://youtu.be/PnRaA-CaNX8

### Setup
Step 1. Download FacebookSDK here https://developers.facebook.com/docs/ios/
Step 2. Make sure it's under `~/Documents/FacebookSDK`
Step 3. Use CocoaPods, do `pod install` in the root directory in Terminal
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
